data.meta_description: I am excited to announce that I have accepted an offer to be a 2023 Summer Research Analyst at Momentum Cyber. Thank you Garrett Vaz, Cole Grolmus, and John…
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

I am excited to announce that I have accepted an offer to be a 2023 Summer Research Analyst at Momentum Cyber. Thank you Garrett Vaz, Cole Grolmus, and John Gould for this opportunity. I look forward to working with the team and making a big impact this summer!
